recommended_treatment: Systemic therapy plus external beam radiation therapy and vaginal brachytherapy
description: High-grade endometrioid adenocarcinoma with full-thickness myometrial invasion, serosal penetration, and lymphovascular invasion, with no nodal metastases.
patient_notes: Your surgery showed endometrial cancer that has spread through the uterine muscle to the outer surface. The cancer has not spread to lymph nodes. Recommended treatment includes chemotherapy and targeted radiation therapy to reduce the risk of recurrence.

verification.assessment: The extracted staging is accurate: full‐thickness myometrial invasion with serosal penetration and no nodal metastases corresponds to pT3a N0 and FIGO IIIA. All other fields correctly reflect the pathology findings and NCCN guideline recommendations.
